viewData.name: Samsung Q6FN 82" Class HDR UHD Smart QLED TV
viewData.short_description: Buy Samsung Q6FN 82" Class HDR UHD Smart QLED TV featuring UHD 3840 x 2160 LED Panel, HDR10, HDR10+, HLG Support Motion Rate 240 for Reduced Motion Blur. Review Samsung Q6FN
viewData.long_description: View content at four times the resolution of 1080p with the Samsung Q6FN 82" Class HDR UHD Smart QLED TV. This TV has an 81.5" LED-backlit LCD display, and incorporates Motion Rate 240 technology to digitally enhance fast-moving images to reduce blur. It is compatible with the HDR10, HDR10+, and HLG HDR formats to provide a wider color gamut with compatible content and other equipment for more vivid images. The Q6FN has built-in Wi-Fi connectivity to allow access to your favorite apps and Internet-based content, plus content sharing and screen mirroring with your other smart devices such as your smartphone or tablet. With four HDMI inputs, there are multiple options for connecting high-definition video sources. Three USB ports are also onboard for connecting multimedia peripherals like flash drives.
